slides.question: What can we do with these shortcuts: ctrl-c and ctrl-v (cmd-c and cmd-v for Apple users)?

slides.text: Go click Show bookmark bar to make bookmarks visible on every browser tab. Then visit Wikipedia, copy part of the article and paste it into Google Translate to read it in your language. After you are done, save links to your Help Tools folder.
If you successfuly finished the challenge for this lesson, click to complete the lesson.
